---
title: Linear Combination
description: "The operation given to the process of taking the product of each corresponding element in a [vector](vector.qmd), and summing all products. Also known as [dot product](dot_product.qmd)."
---

---

$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
2 \\
3 \\
\end{bmatrix}
\cdot 
\begin{bmatrix}
4 \\
5 \\
6 \\
\end{bmatrix}
= (1 \cdot 4) + (2 \cdot 5) + (3 \cdot 6) = 32 
$$
